alert.note: Alert for Geauga; Portage; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 6:09PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Portage, northwestern Trumbull and southeastern Geauga Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 609 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ravenna, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warren, Ravenna, Cortland, Newton Falls, Middlefield, Garrettsville, North Bloomfield, Mantua, West Farmington, Bristolville, Leavittsburg, Parkman, Mecca, Edinburg, Windham, Hiram, Brady Lake, Wayland, South Canal and Turnpike Interchange. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
